entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 08:00 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
